text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With a seventh victory added to her<n>flawless record, all
eyes are on<n>Mihono Bourbon, if they weren't<n>already.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As far as the media's concerned,<n>she's practically already
won the<n>Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Admirer A
text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon! Please, shake my<n>hand!

text_block_list.name: Admirer B
text_block_list.text: I'd give anything for your autograph!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Same here! I'll take a big ol' ketchup<n>signature on this
omelet rice—and<n>make it cutesy!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Very well. I'm not sure I understand<n>the last part of your
request, but I'll do<n>my best.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Cutesy... cutesy...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ooh, that's it! Give it some steez!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ding dong

text_block_list.name: School Announcement
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon, the student council<n>president would like to
see you.<n>Please report to her office.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: President Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Knock, knock

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Come in.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. You called, President<n>Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes. We've had a veritable flood of<n>interview requests for
you. I was<n>hoping you'd acquiesce.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's no wonder, what with the<n>undefeated Triple Crown right
before<n>your eyes. Expectations are high.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But those expectations... Do you not<n>feel undue pressure
from them?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No. Even if I did feel pressure, I would<n>simply convert it to
strength.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Good. Spoken like one who is<n>prepared for greatness.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The Triple Crown requires much<n>mental fortitude to wear. I
would see<n>you run as your usual self.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I will.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...However, I am cognizant of the fact<n>that achieving the
Triple Crown will be<n>no easy task.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower... With each victory over<n>her, I seem to only
grow more aware<n>of this.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I see. You mean to say she is your...<n>Ah, but what use is it
putting it into<n>words?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
My position does not allow me to play<n>favorites, but I do
hope to see a<n>satisfying end to this year's<n>Classics.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I'll keep that in mind.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...That aside, President. There's<n>something I want to ask
you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: If I can be of help, I shall gladly<n>answer.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
When giving an autograph, how might<n>one make it more
"cutesy"?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...I'm afraid that goes beyond my<n>area of expertise.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: In my office, before practice.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Check it out! Guess who got<n>Bourbon's autograph?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: On omelet rice, of all things?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...The letters are cute.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
This is for you, Rice! I know you pack<n>a bigger appetite than
you let on! Dig<n>in!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hweh?! You're not supposed to tell<n>people that!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Is it just me, or is everybodytalking about Bourbon?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Given her undefeated record, it's<n>only natural. You can't
help but<n>wonder just how far she'll go.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
We've nothing to fear. Rice's abilities<n>rival hers, and that
speaks for itself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The shrinking gap between them with<n>each race is proof of
that.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though Rice lost to Bourbon yet again<n>in her most recent
race, it was closer<n>than in the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Plus, her ambition is now fully<n>focused on winning against
her rival.
choice_data_list: The Kikuka Sho is all yours!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh? Look at you, oozing with<n>confidence!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
It's because training so much with<n>you all has made me
into a stronger<n>runner.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I just can't wait to run against her<n>again. It's all I can think
about.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's learned to feel excited about<n>races instead of
anxious. That's how<n>you know she's grown.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing real progress in her repeated<n>runs against Bourbon
must have<n>given her confidence.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
All right! Let's kick off today's<n>training! First up, three laps
around the<n>island of Shikoku!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's easily over 3,000 kilometers!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I'll do my best.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even as expectations for her rival pile<n>high, Rice Shower's
fighting spirit<n>burns all the brighter.
